channel.title: Task 5: Submitting Your Work :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Before you submit your work, you should test out your code. Test Words First run some test words with your program. Here are some words you can use to test your code: JavaScript = 24 points using Scrabble, 10 using Simple Score, and 16 using Bonus Vowels. Scrabble = 14 points using Scrabble, 8 using Simple Score, and 12 using Bonus Vowels. Zox = 19 points using Scrabble, 3 using Simple Score, and 5 using Bonus Vowels. Example Output Review the code for each test word to see that it works as expected. Here is an example of the output you may see.
